bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, Hudson laid-back design with low ride height, alloy kickstand
bike.paint_description: M: Azurite Blue, Candy Apple, Gloss Black   S/T: Cucumber, Grape Jelly, TigerJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs Eye

components.description: Alex DC25 alloy double-wall rims, 32H, Shimano Nexus 5-speed rear & Formula alloy QR front hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with whitewalls or skinwalls
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Hi-rise comfort, 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
Slidepad braking system with ProMax forged alloy direct pull brakes & Tektro alloy comfort lever
